article.title: Be Careful What You Post Online

content.brief: Social media can be a useful tool to connect with friends and loved ones. However, providing valuable personal information like your birthdate, where you were born, and the name of your high school on social media lays the groundwork for nefarious actors to steal your identity. Posting statuses and pictures using geolocation features can be used to find you, or help potential thieves know that you aren’t at home. Use privacy options available within your social media to limit the visibility.
